name: Space Assault (Anthony Mendez)
description:
• A 3D Game made with Unity Personal Edition.
  • I decided to take Ben Tristem's Unity 3D Course on Udemy and I love it so far. My only personal gripe with it, is it feels a bit slow as someone who has a bit of experience with Unity. But I'm sticking with it since I've already learned a few things from it.
